card.name: Mew
card.text: Flying Tap any number of Pokémon you control: each Pokémon tapped this way gains Indestructible until the end of the turn.

card.name: Red
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put all Pokémon cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. [−3]: You may put a Pokémon card from your hand onto the battlefield. [−7]: For each Pokémon you control, create a token that's a copy of that Pokémon.

card.name: Blue
card.text: [+2]: Remove all status counters from up to 1 target Pokémon. You gain 1 life for each counter removed this way. [-3]: Discard a card, then return a Pokémon from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped. [−7]: Untap all Pokémon you control. Until the end of the turn, your Pokémon have +3/+3, lifelink, indestructible, haste, vigilance, and hexproof.

card.name: Green
card.text: [+1]: Each player searches their library for an artifact, puts it into their hand, and shuffles their library. [-2]: Return an enchantment or artifact from your graveyard to your hand. [−5]: For each Pokémon you control, search your library for a TM enchantment card and put that card into play enchanting that Pokémon. Then, shuffle your library.

card.name: Brock
card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gets +2/+2 until the end of the turn. [−2]: Search your library for a Rock or Ground Pokémon, shuffle it, and put that card on top of it. [−4]: You get an emblem with "Whenever you evolve a Pokémon, put 2 +1/+1 counters on it."

card.name: Misty
card.text: [+1]: Tap or untap target Pokémon. [−1]: Target Water Pokémon is unblockable until end of turn. [−6]: Draw 2 cards for each Pokémon you control.

card.name: Lt Surge
card.text: [+1]: Target Pokémon gains vigilance and haste until end of turn. [−3]: Put a paralyze counter on each Pokémon you don't control. You gain 1 life for each paralyze counter added this way. [−6]: Target Pokémon gains indestructible until end of turn. Deal 12 damage to all Pokémon.

card.name: Erika
card.text: [+1]: Add G, U or W. [x2]: Reveal your hand. You gain 1 life for each Pokémon card among them. [−X]: Your Pokémon get +X/+X until end of turn.

card.name: Koga
card.text: [+1]: Put a confusion counter on target Pokémon. [+2]: Put a poison counter on target Pokémon. You gain life equal to the number of poison counters on that Pokémon. [−6]: You get an emblem with "whenever an opponent loses life because of a poison counter, you gain that much life."

card.name: Sabrina
card.text: [+1]: Reveal the top card of target player's library. [-2]: Search your library for a card, shuffle it, and put that card 4th from the bottom. [-4]: Target player discards a card, then each player draws cards equal to their hand size.

card.name: Blaine
card.text: [+0]: Target Pokémon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. [+0]: Draw a card, then discard a card. [−3]: You get an emblem with "Your sorceries that prevent damage or remove damage have Flash."

card.name: Giovanni
card.text: [+1]: Draw a card. You lose 1 life for each card in your hand. [+0]: Each player sacrifices a Pokémon or Trainer. [-8]: Each player discards their hand. Put all Pokémon cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Bill
card.text: Draw 2 cards.

card.name: Pokéball
card.text: Search your library for a Pokémon and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your library.

card.name: Switch
card.text: Return target Pokémon you control to its owner's hand. If you do, put a Pokémon from your hand into play with an equal or lower converted mana cost.

card.name: Master Ball
card.text: Look at the top 7 cards of your library, put a Pokémon among those cards onto the battlefield and put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Stonefinder Radar
card.text: Search your library for an Evolution Stone card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your library.

card.name: Pokéflute
card.text: Remove all sleep counters from all Pokémon.

card.name: Bubble Blower
card.text: Search your library for a Water Pokémon and put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Revive
card.text: Return a Pokémon from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped, with a paralyze counter on it.

card.name: Max Revive
card.text: Return a Pokémon from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Energy Search Mk2
card.text: Search your library for a land card and put it on the battlefield tapped. Shuffle your library.

card.name: Gambler
card.text: Shuffle your hand into your deck. Flip a coin. If heads, draw 8 cards. If tails, draw 1 card.

card.name: Mysterious Fossil
card.text: Search your library for "Omanyte" or "Kabuto" and put that card into your hand. Then, shuffle your library.

card.name: Potion
card.text: Remove all damage from target Pokémon.

card.name: Super Shocker
card.text: Put 2 paralyze counters on target Pokémon. Put 2 burn counters on target Pokémon.

card.name: Weather Control Device
card.text: Shuffle target land you control into your library. If you do, search your library for a basic land card and put it into play. Then, shuffle your deck.

card.name: PlusPower
card.text: Target Pokémon gets +1/+1 and Haste until the end of the turn.

card.name: SuperPsych++
card.text: Put 2 +1/+1 counters on target Pokémon.

card.name: Radarbeam
card.text: Activate target Pokémon's evolution ability, ignoring its cost.

card.name: Devolution Spray
card.text: Remove all tokens from target Pokémon.

card.name: Thunderstone
card.text: T: Add R or W. Thunderstone deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Leaf Stone
card.text: T: Add G.

card.name: Water Stone
card.text: T: Add U.

card.name: Fire Stone
card.text: T: Add R.

card.name: Moonstone
card.text: T: Add B or W.

card.name: Generic Evolution Stone
card.text: T: Add one mana of any color. T: Add 2 mana of any colors. That mana can only be spent to activate Evolve abilities.

card.name: Roboberry
card.text: Equip 1 Sacrifice: regenerate equipped Pokémon.

card.name: Pokédoll
card.text: Sacrifice Pokédoll: prevent all combat damage this turn.

card.name: Thunderbolt
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon gets +2/+0 and has "when this Pokémon deals damage to another Pokémon, put that many paralyze counters on it."

card.name: Ice Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "1U: put a frozen counter on target Pokémon."

card.name: Hyper Beam
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon gets +5/+0 when blocked, and has "when this Pokémon attacks it doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step".

card.name: Spit Up
card.text: Enchant Pokémon Enchanted Pokémon has "T: put a +1/+1 counter on this Pokémon." When enchanted Pokémon has 3 or more +1/+1 counters on it, sacrifice this card. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Pallet Town
card.text: T: Add 1 of any color. Spend this mana only to cast Pokémon spells with mana cost 2 or less. 4, T: Draw a card

card.name: Pewter City
card.text: T: Add R. If you control an Evolution Stone, add RR instead.

card.name: Cerulean City
card.text: T: Add U. T: Return target Water Pokémon you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Viridian City

card.name: Saffron City

card.name: Celadon City

card.name: Vermillion City

card.name: Fuschia City
card.text: T: Add B. 2B: put a poison counter on target Pokémon.

card.name: Saffron City
card.text: T: Add B. 1B, T: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Cinnabar Island

card.name: Lavender Town
